mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP(TRIPNUM, TRIPNAME, TRIPCATALOGUE, TRIPCOMENT, TRIPREGION, TRIPIMAGE, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE, DELETEYN, SPOTHIT) VALUES ( (SELECT 'S' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.TRIPNUM, -4)), 0) + 1, 4, 0) AS CHABUM FROM TRIP A), #{tripname}, #{tripcatalogue}, #{tripcoment}, #{tripregion}, #{tripimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.TRIPNUM TRIPNUM, A.TRIPNAME TRIPNAME, A.TRIPCATALOGUE TRIPCATALOGUE, A.TRIPCOMENT TRIPCOMENT, A.TRIPREGION TRIPREGION, A.TRIPIMAGE TRIPIMAGE, TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE, A.DELETEYN DELETEYN, A.SPOTHIT SPOTHIT, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.TRIPNUM DESC) / #{pageSize} ) pageSize, COUNT(A.TRIPNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM TRIP A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC
) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage}

SELECT A.TRIPNUM TRIPNUM, A.TRIPNAME TRIPNAME, A.TRIPCATALOGUE TRIPCATALOGUE, A.TRIPCOMENT TRIPCOMENT, A.TRIPREGION TRIPREGION, A.TRIPIMAGE TRIPIMAGE, TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE, A.DELETEYN DELETEYN, A.SPOTHIT SPOTHIT FROM TRIP A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.TRIPNUM = #{tripnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TRIP SET SPOTHIT = (SELECT NVL(MAX(SPOTHIT), 0) + 1 FROM TRIP WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND TRIPNUM = #{tripnum}),UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND TRIPNUM = #{tripnum}
UPDATE TRIP SET TRIPNAME = #{tripname}, TRIPCATALOGUE = #{tripcatalogue}, TRIPCOMENT = #{tripcoment}, TRIPREGION = #{tripregion}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND TRIPNUM = #{tripnum}
UPDATE TRIP SET DELETEYN = 'N', UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND TRIPNUM = #{tripnum}
